subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|alt=齩}}
Perhaps {{cog|sit}}; compare {{cog|cdm|ङेव्‍ह्‌सा||to nibble|tr=ŋewh-}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). The Min vernacular readings are reminiscent of {{cog|tai-pro|*giəwᶜ||to chew}}, whence {{cog|th|เคี้ยว}} ([[ibid.]]).
